name: Hilton Millennium Seoul

reviews.text: I've been traveling to Seoul everyother month for 2 year. I've stayed at the Hyatt and Westin, however, the Hilton is my favorite and have stayed there the last 8 trips. The location can't be beat: near Namdemun market, Seoul Station, 3 subway lines, Namsan Mt, and the Meoyndong district. The service is excellent from checkin to room service to the executive lounges-there are two, with excellent views of downtown, Namsan Mountain, and Seoul Tower. Highly recommend staying here for the best expirence in Seoul!

description: Welcome to Millennium Seoul Hilton An inspiring venue for business and leisure travellersMillennium Seoul Hilton is located at the foot of Mt. Namsan, close to the business, cultural, historic and shopping sites of Seoul.The hotel has four floors of Executive rooms, suites and lounges, as well as eight on-site restaurants offering an array of international and local cuisine. With 25,000ft² of meeting and event space, and an 8,000ft² gymnasium, swimming pool and spa complex, this hotel is the perfect place to go for a serious workout or simply to relax and wind down after work.Also, travel between Incheon Int’l airport to Millennium Seoul Hilton by using the Arex Express high speed train to Seoul Station followed by the hotel's complimentary shuttle bus is now available. Trains depart Incheon Int'l airport every 30 min. starting from 05:20 hrs to until 21:30 hrs. The total travel time is 43 min. The hotel shuttle service operates every hour on the hour from 09:00 hrs to 19:00 hrs departing from the main entrance of the hotel. At Seoul Station contact the Millennium Seoul Hilton Support desk for assistance during arrival, and at departure contact the Hotel Concierge desk for information regarding Seoul Station shuttle timings. For your convenience, Arex Express Train tickets are available for sale at the hotel’s front desk.
